modShortDescription: A recipe to extract acid from batteries in the chem station in 7 Days to die Alpha 20.
modDescription:
A recipe to extract acid from batteries in the chem station in 7 Days to die Alpha 20.

This is Ruinedworld’s first mod here. He made this for his server where acid seems to be at an all-time low. Call it bad luck, or an overuse of antacids, but this will give a better use for all those level one batteries! He figured if you have unlocked the ChemStation, which takes some time. Then this shouldn’t feel unbalanced.

## Changelog

Changed the file structure so that it’s not packed two folders deep and added an item.xml to define the recipe to the workbench search feature.

**[Download](https://github.com/ruinedworld/7DaystoDie_BatteryAcidRecipe/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26721-battery-acid-a20/).

**Credits:** Ruinedworld, Enios
